name: DashGem
description:
A series of levels that introduce and explore player mechanics, level mechanics, and the interaction between them. [Advanced Game Design & Development @ Reykjavik University]

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Space (hold for more power)
  • Dash: Shift

Attribution:

  • Loophole sound from: Sergenious 
  • Portal sound from: PMSFX
